summary: Independent government cost estimates help the government understand the potential cost of a contract. They're an important planning tool, especially for service contracts. Some of the agencies that spend the most on service contracts may not be taking advantage of this tool: we found uneven guidance on when to use estimates. We also found different levels of detail in the estimates themselves, which can affect...
title: Service Contracts: Agencies Should Take Steps to More Effectively Use Independent Government Cost Estimates
